channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: While she and her husband discerned marriage, Susan Sucher began to question inconsistencies in Pentecostal theology which led her to explore the Church and become Catholic.

channel.title: Ewtn news nightly
channel.desc: The Jubilee of Youth in Rome draws thousands of young pilgrims. The event is packed with activities, including Masses, concerts, time for confession, and a pilg.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Catholic sphere
channel.desc: Doug Keck and his expert panelists discuss whether Vatican II was a development or a rupture of the tradition of what had come before by pastorally trying a new approach.

channel.name: EWTN UK

channel.desc: Encounter the other side of sports where stars such as Mike Piazza, Darrell Miller, Tom Glavine, and Jeff Suppan display their devotion to faith and family, Wor.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern.
